About Sid Wilson

As the President and CEO of A Private Guide, Inc., Sid Wilson has dedicated over two decades to transforming the travel experience for adventurers and explorers alike. Drawing inspiration from his mentor, James P. Beckwourth, Sid embodies the spirit of exploration, guiding individuals and groups to uncharted territories across the West. Under his leadership, A Private Guide, Inc. has flourished, offering expertly curated group tours and event transportation services that cater to a diverse clientele. Sid's commitment to customer service and community development has not only enhanced the travel experience but also fostered a deeper appreciation for the rich cultural and natural heritage of the regions he explores.  
  
Sid's expertise extends beyond traditional guided tours; he is also proficient in foreign language guide services, ensuring that travelers from various backgrounds can fully immerse themselves in their adventures. His strategic communications skills and media relations acumen have positioned him as a prominent spokesperson in the travel industry, advocating for sustainable tourism practices and public policy initiatives that benefit local communities. Key projects under Sid's direction include innovative tour packages that highlight lesser-known destinations, promoting responsible travel while providing unforgettable experiences.  
  
With a passion for exploration and a deep understanding of the travel landscape, Sid Wilson continues to lead A Private Guide, Inc. into new frontiers, inspiring others to embark on their own journeys of discovery. His vision not only enriches the lives of those he guides but also contributes to the broader narrative of adventure tourism in the West.

data.markdown:
Contact us
==========

![](https://contactout.com/images/bg-cta.svg)

### Remove my data

Need to opt-out or revise the information about me in ContactOut?

[Opt-out request](https://contactout.com/optout)

**Support:** [\[email protected\]](https://contactout.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#9feceaefeff0edebdffcf0f1ebfefcebf0eaebb1fcf0f2)

**Sales inquiries:** [\[email protected\]](https://contactout.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#c8bba9a4adbb88aba7a6bca9abbca7bdbce6aba7a5)

934 Howard St San Francisco, CA 94103 United States

FAQ
---

### Does ContactOut work on multiple browsers?

At this time ContactOut works exclusively with Google Chrome.

### How can I reset my password?

To reset your password select “Forgot Your Password” on the login screen. Enter your email and you will be sent a link to reset your password.

### I am having trouble using ContactOut.

Email [\[email protected\]](https://contactout.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#f0838580809f8284b0939f9e849193849f8584de939f9d)
 and tell us what errors you are experiencing. Please be as specific as possible and include a screenshot.

### How do I verify my account?

After you use 5 credits you will be sent a verification email. Simply follow the directions to click the link included in the email and your account will be verified. If you encounter any issues please let us know.

### Can I be certain that I am given accurate contact information?

All emails in our database were triple verified. This means that each contact has passed three tests:

*   Does the email match the correct individual's social media profiles?
*   Is the email associated with the correct LinkedIn profile?
*   Can the email pass a bounce test to ensure delivery?

### How do I opt-out or revise the information about me in ContactOut?

Simply fill out this [opt-out form](https://contactout.com/optout)
 and your submission will be processed within one week.

### Does ContactOut have an API?

We are only able to offer API at the Enterprise level. If you are currently negotiating an Enterprise plan please let us know you are interested in API. We are happy to discuss options!

### How much does ContactOut cost?

ContactOut is priced per user at a rate competitive with other high-value recruiting products. Please contact [\[email protected\]](https://contactout.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#bbc8dad7dec8fbd8d4d5cfdad8cfd4cecf95d8d4d6)

### How can I cancel my subscription?

Cancellations and Refunds

*   MONTHLY: You can cancel your paid monthly plan at any time prior to your next billing date. When you cancel your plan, you still retain your remaining lookups until your next billing date. To cancel your plan click the MANAGE SUBSCRIPTION button on your [account page](https://contactout.com/profile)
     Or you can email [\[email protected\]](https://contactout.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)
    
*   ANNUAL: You can cancel your annual subscription within the first 30 days of purchase provided that you have used less than 100 credits. You will be refunded the annual price less the one month price. To cancel your annual subscription email: [\[email protected\]](https://contactout.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)
    

### I am an existing customer, how can I get help?

If you are an existing customer and have questions on getting set up or how to use the product, please contact [\[email protected\]](https://contactout.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#25565055554a575165464a4b514446514a50510b464a48)

![Denver Public Library logo](https://images.contactout.com/companies/b8345ba58cf11d403c95b5793b4e07bf) Denver Public Library ===================== [](https://www.linkedin.com/company/denver-public-library) [Get verified emails for Denver Public Library employees\ -------------------------------------------------------\ \ ![arrow](https://contactout.com/images/ico-arrow-narrow-right.svg)](javascript:;) * [Profile](https://contactout.com/company/denver-public-library-1751930) * [Email Format](https://contactout.com/company/denver-public-library-email-format-1751930) About Denver Public Library --------------------------- The Denver Public Library connects people with information, ideas and experiences to provide enjoyment, enrich lives and strengthen our community. The Library strives to positively impact the community in several Ways, including: Immersing children from birth in literacy-rich environments where they discover the joy of reading and learning, motivating them to achieve and graduate from high school. Improving people's lives by allowing them to acquire the resources and skills needed to prosper and contribute to Denver's economy. Providing a forum where people's lives can be enriched by reading, learning, and engaging in experiences here that make Denver a better place to live. For over a century, the Library has provided educational and entertainment materials to the people of Denver and beyond. Throughout its history, DPL has adapted to meet the changing needs of the community. While books, eBooks, movies, and music still remain important, the Library today acts as a technology hub; a community center where organizations from around the City convene and collaborate; and a welcoming place for lifelong learning. Denver Public Library is funded through the City and County of Denver’s General Fund, and is governed by the eight-member Mayor-appointed Library Commission. The Denver Public Library Friends Foundation, founded in 1940, supports the Library through advocacy and fundraising through memberships, the annual Summer and Winter Used Books Sales, and their signature event, the Booklovers Ball. see more | | | | --- | --- | | ![website icon](https://contactout.com/images/ico-link-01.svg)

Data quality
------------

How we source  
our data
------------------------

At ContactOut, we source, store and refresh our data firsthand. Other vendors purchase contact lists that have been resold hundreds of times. Rest assured that you will receive the most accurate contact information of decision-makers & candidates that you cannot find elsewhere.

*   ### Search
    
    We scan the entire internet for emails and phone numbers.
    
*   ### Powerful Servers
    
    Our servers crawl billions of webpages daily.
    
*   ### AI matching
    
    We use Artificial Intelligence to match contact information with each person.
    
*   ### 99% accuracy
    
    Emails and phone numbers are triple verified with 99% confidence.

![PGGM logo](https://images.contactout.com/companies/c378bd1f44a7804dc33a4134bcc52ca3) PGGM ==== [](https://www.linkedin.com/company/pggm) [Get verified emails for PGGM employees\ --------------------------------------\ \ ![arrow](https://contactout.com/images/ico-arrow-narrow-right.svg)](javascript:;) * [Profile](https://contactout.com/company/pggm-2909318) * [Email Format](https://contactout.com/company/pggm-email-format-2909318) About PGGM ---------- Wij zijn PGGM. Een vaste waarde in zorg en welzijn. We zetten ons in voor een betaalbaar, goed en duurzaam pensioen voor pensioenfondsen - onze opdrachtgevers - en hun deelnemers. Daarnaast dragen we bij aan een leefbare wereld, gezond werken en vitaal ouder worden. We zijn een coöperatieve pensioenuitvoeringsorganisatie zonder winstoogmerk. We bieden onze klanten pensioenbeheer, vermogensbeheer en beleidsadvisering. PGGM beheert de pensioenen van verschillende pensioenfondsen, de daarbij aangesloten werkgevers en hun werknemers. Op 31 december 2020 beheerden we 266 miljard euro aan pensioenvermogen en administreerden pensioen voor 4,4 miljoen deelnemers. Daarnaast ontwikkelen wij aanvullende diensten voor de ruim 750.000 mensen afkomstig uit de sector zorg en welzijn die zich aan onze ledenorganisatie PGGM&CO hebben verbonden. \----- We are PGGM. A solid value in health and welfare. We work for good, affordable and sustainable pensions for pension funds - our clients - and their participants. We also contribute towards a liveable world, occupational health and retaining vitality in old age. PGGM is a not-for-profit cooperative pension fund service provider. We provide services in the field of pension management, integral asset management and executive advice to pension funds, affiliated employers and their employees. On 31 December 2020, we managed pension assets worth EUR 266 billion for different pension funds. In addition, we are developing supplementary services in the fields of pensions, healthcare, living and working for employers and the more than 750,000 members we have in the health and social sector. see more | | | | --- | --- | | ![website icon](https://contactout.com/images/ico-link-01.svg)

Alfa Laval is a leading global provider of first-rate products in the areas of heat transfer, separation and fluid handling. With these as its base, Alfa Laval aims to help enhance the productivity and competitiveness of its customers in various industries throughout the world. We define their challenges and deliver sustainable products and solutions that meet their requirements – mainly in energy, the environment, food and the marine industry. Founded in 1883, Alfa Laval today has ~17,500 employees and is listed on Nasdaq OMX. Read more about us and how we make a difference on our website. data.markdown:
The Recruitment Mastery Hub
===========================

**👋 Welcome to our collection of 350+ recruiting articles, videos, guides, bookmarks, templates and more – all in one place!**

We’ve handpicked this set of recruiting materials _(yep, including the templates we swear by!)_ – the kind we so wished we had on Day 1 of our recruiting adventure. We’re optimistic that they’ll supercharge your journey in mastering recruitment.

**So, who will benefit from this?**

*   🕵️‍♀️ **Recruitment Professionals** – Whether you belong to an agency or you’re an in-house recruiter, you’ll find content that’ll help you step up your game.
*   🏔️ **HR Leaders & Visionaries** – Elevate your entire squad’s hiring game with intuitive guides and savvy tools.
*   🚀 **Startup Founders & Business Trailblazers** – Fast track your team building with time-tested techniques and hacks.

* * *

**Table of Contents**

*   **🐸 [ContactOut’s Recruiting Stories](https://contactout.com/blog/the-recruitment-mastery-hub/#contactout-recruiting-stories)
    **
*   **🏁 [Starting Out](https://contactout.com/blog/the-recruitment-mastery-hub/#starting-out)
    **
*   **🔎 [Sourcing](https://contactout.com/blog/the-recruitment-mastery-hub/#sourcing)
    **
*   **📧 [Engaging](https://contactout.com/blog/the-recruitment-mastery-hub/#engaging)
    **

*   **📊 [Reporting & Tools](https://contactout.com/blog/the-recruitment-mastery-hub/#reporting-tools)

We plan to update this resource regularly.

**[Share your feedback or suggestion here!](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfo8zVcGX33u45USbIqmWwwSZngYbeyDGKYqKs2IF3dYBZIdg/viewform?usp=sf_link)
**

* * *

**🐸 ContactOut’s Recruiting Stories**
======================================

* * *

#### **How We Built Our Teams**

*   **💚 [Scaling our Engineering Team: How ContactOut Built 3 Pioneer Squads in One Year](https://contactout.com/blog/scaling-our-engineering-team-how-contactout-built-3-pioneer-squads-in-one-year/)
    **
*   **💚 [How ContactOut Built 3 Pioneer Squads in One Year ft. Our Product Design Team](https://contactout.com/blog/how-contactout-built-3-pioneer-squads-in-one-year-ft-our-product-design-team/)
    **
*   **💚 [How ContactOut Built 3 Pioneer Squads in One Year ft. Our Product Management Team](https://contactout.com/blog/how-contactout-built-3-pioneer-squads-in-one-year-ft-our-product-mangement-team/)
    **

#### **How We Recruit and Hire**

*   **💚 [How We Craft Our Job Descriptions To Attract Top Talents To Join ContactOut](https://contactout.com/blog/how-we-craft-our-job-descriptions-to-attract-top-talents-to-join-contactout/)
    **
*   **💚 [6 Candidate Outreach Messages that Don’t Suck (Why It Works and How We Applied It)](https://contactout.com/blog/6-candidate-outreach-messages-that-dont-suck-why-it-works-and-how-we-applied-it/)
    **
*   **💚 [What Candidates Interviewing In Startups Really Want To Know (Actual Questions Asked By Our Team at ContactOut)](https://contactout.com/blog/what-candidates-interviewing-in-startups-really-want-to-know-actual-questions-asked-by-our-team-at-contactout/)
    **
*   **💚 [Always Be Closing: Preparing For Your First Candidate Call (How We Do It at ContactOut)](https://contactout.com/blog/always-be-closing-preparing-for-your-first-candidate-call-how-we-do-it-at-contactout/)
    **
*   **💚 [How Books Influence Our Hiring and Shape Our Team’s Success at ContactOut](https://contactout.com/blog/how-books-influence-our-hiring-and-shape-our-teams-success-at-contactout/)
    **

**🏁 Starting Out**
===================

* * *

#### **Designing Job In-Take Forms**

*   **💚 [ContactOut’s Guide to Mastering Intake Meetings & Job Intake Forms](https://contactout.com/blog/contactouts-definitive-guide-to-mastering-intake-meetings-job-intake-forms/)
    **
*   📌 [Hiring Manager-Recruiter Intake Meeting Questions](https://resources.workable.com/hiring-manager-intake-meeting-questions)
    
*   📝 [ContactOut’s Job Intake Form](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1IIQI5r1ZMPG8YyIk1XTqawzOSgkAb9ypZt5uNIuYfUE/edit?usp=sharing)
      🐸 **Our own template!**
*   📝 [Recruiting Intake Form Template](https://wpforms.com/templates/recruiting-intake-form-template/)
    : Here’s the basics. Turn it into your own
*   📝 [Template: Intake form by TalentDrop](https://almanac.io/docs/template-intake-form-e0812e6ee47a7ac0ff23917fcaa58509)
    

#### **Talent Mapping**

*   **💚 [ContactOut’s Guide to Talent Mapping](https://contactout.com/blog/contactouts-definitive-guide-to-talent-mapping/)
    **
*   📌 [Talent Mapping: How to Build a Strong Sourcing Strategy](https://www.matchr.io/talent-mapping-souring-strategy/)
     ⭐ **Our top choice!**
*   📌 [Talent Mapping for Recruiters](https://recruiterflow.com/blog/talent-mapping-for-recruiters/#What_is_Talent_Mapping)
    

#### **Setting Up The Hiring Process**

*   **💚 [ContactOut’s Guide to Setting Up the Hiring Process](https://contactout.com/blog/contactouts-definitive-guide-to-setting-up-the-hiring-process/)
    **
*   📌 [How to build a recruitment process](https://www.lucidchart.com/blog/creating-a-recruitment-process)
    : comes with a downloadable template
*   📌 [Hiring Process Steps: Hiring Success Glossary](https://www.smartrecruiters.com/resources/glossary/hiring-process-steps/)
    
*   📌 [How to build a best-in-class hiring process](https://asana.com/resources/hiring-process)
    

#### **Defining Job Roles, Levels, And Titles**

*   **💚 [ContactOut’s Guide to Defining Job Roles, Levels & Titles](https://contactout.com/blog/contactouts-definitive-guide-to-defining-job-roles-levels-titles/)
    **
*   📌 [Understanding and Using Job Levels and Salary Bands](https://www.heywelcome.com/blog/understanding-and-using-job-levels-and-salary-bands)
    
*   📌 [How Roles, Levels, and Titles Fit Together](https://www.holloway.com/g/technical-recruiting-hiring/sections/how-roles-levels-and-titles-fit-together)
    
*   📌 [Job Levels by Pave](https://support.pave.com/hc/en-us/articles/4430985339799-Job-Levels)
    : see job levels in action

#### **Salary Benchmarking**

*   **💚 [ContactOut’s Guide to Salary Benchmarking](https://contactout.com/blog/contactouts-definitive-guide-to-salary-benchmarking/)
    **
*   📌 [How to Conduct a Salary Benchmarking Exercise](https://www.occupop.com/blog/how-to-conduct-a-salary-benchmarking-process-free-template)
    
*   📌 [How to Do Salary Benchmarking for Global Teams](https://www.omnipresent.com/articles/how-to-do-salary-benchmarking-for-global-teams)
    
*   📌 [How much should I earn (or pay)?](https://www.comprehensive.io/)
    

#### **Writing Job Descriptions**

*   **💚 [ContactOut’s Guide to Writing Job Descriptions](https://contactout.com/blog/contactouts-definitive-guide-to-writing-job-descriptions/)
    **
*   📌 [11 Tips For Crafting Highly Effective Job Descriptions](https://www.cio.com/article/230924/how-to-craft-highly-effective-job-descriptions.html)

About Adriaan Pietersma

Adriaan Pietersma, as the CEO of Feenstra, plays a pivotal role in steering the company towards operational excellence and sustainable growth in the technical services sector. With a robust background in operational management and change management, Adriaan is dedicated to enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of Feenstra's service delivery. His expertise in workforce management and workflow optimization has been instrumental in implementing Lean methodologies, which have significantly improved performance metrics across the organization.  
  
Under Adriaan's leadership, Feenstra has embarked on several key projects aimed at organizational development and whole-scale change. One notable initiative is the integration of advanced ICT solutions to streamline service management processes, ensuring that the technology provided to clients not only meets their immediate needs but also remains reliable and efficient over time. This proactive approach to maintenance and repair services has solidified Feenstra’s reputation as a trusted partner for customers throughout the Netherlands.  
  
Adriaan's analytic thinking and conceptual modeling skills enable him to identify opportunities for improvement and innovation within the company. By fostering a culture of continuous improvement and empowering teams through effective change management strategies, he ensures that Feenstra remains at the forefront of the technical services industry. His commitment to operational management and performance management not only drives business support but also enhances customer satisfaction, making Feenstra a leader in delivering tailored technical solutions that truly resonate with clients.

data.markdown:
The Sales Mastery Hub
=====================

👋 **Hey there and welcome to our collection of 300+ sales articles, videos, guides, bookmarks, templates and more – all in one place!**

We’ve handpicked this set of sales materials _(yep, including the templates we swear by!)_ – the kind we so wished we had on Day 1 of our sales adventure. We’re optimistic that they’ll supercharge your journey in mastering sales.

**So, who will benefit from this?**

*   🕵️‍♀️ **Sales Reps** – Boost your numbers with these easy-to-use guides.
*   🏔️ **Sales Managers** – Lead your team to victory with smart tools.
*   🚀 **S****ales Directors or VP** – Strategize and expand quickly with our proven tricks.

* * *

**Table of Contents**

*   **🏁 [Starting Out](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-mastery-hub/#starting-out)
    **
*   ****📋** [Steps in the Sales Process](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-mastery-hub/#steps-in-the-sales-process)
    **
    *   🔎 **[Prospecting](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-mastery-hub/#prospecting)**

        **

        **

        **
    *   🚫 **[Objection Handling & Negotiations](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-mastery-hub/#objections-handling-negotiations)
        **

        **
    *   **🙋 [Onboarding](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-mastery-hub/#onboarding)
        **
*   **🤖 [AI & Automation in the Sales Process](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-mastery-hub/#ai-automation-in-the-sales-process)
    **
*   **📈 [Measuring the Success of the Sales Process](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-mastery-hub/#measuring-the-success-of-the-sales-process)

*   **🚩 [Sales Operations](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-mastery-hub/#sales-operations)

    **
*   **📺 [Webinar Channels](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-mastery-hub/#webinar-channels)
    **

We plan to update this resource regularly. **[Share your feedback or suggestion here!](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfo8zVcGX33u45USbIqmWwwSZngYbeyDGKYqKs2IF3dYBZIdg/viewform?usp=sf_link)
**

* * *

**🏁 Starting Out**
===================

#### **Building a Winner’s Mentality for Sales Success**

*   📌 [10 Ways You Need to Change How You Think and Talk to Succeed at Sales](https://review.firstround.com/10-ways-you-need-to-change-how-you-think-and-talk-to-succeed-at-sales)
    
*   📌 [Sales Skills 101: 8 Powerful Sales Mindset Qualities to Help You Win More Customers](https://www.salesken.ai/blog/sales-mindset)
    
*   📌 [7 Tips to Build Confidence in Sales & Close More Deals](https://blog.close.com/confidence-in-sales/)
    
*   📌 [The Wolf of Wall Street: Straight Line Persuasion Review](http://lifelessons.co/personal-development/the-wolf-of-wall-street/)
    
*   📌 [When Sales Isn’t Just Selling: Advice for Founders in Early Markets](https://a16z.com/when-sales-isnt-just-selling-advice-for-founders-in-early-markets/)
    

#### **Setting up Your Sales Strategy**

*   📝 [22 Best Sales Strategies, Plans, & Initiatives for Success \[Templates\]](https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/sales-strategy)
    
*   📌 [Sales Strategy Guide: 5 Steps to More Efficient Selling](https://www.salesforce.com/blog/sales-strategy/?d=7013y000002kwbuaa4&gclid=Cj0KCQjwpc-oBhCGARIsAH6ote8qbrs5qbspsNo7EVelkiXDYbMug2yFr9_SJGSp35RGRLLxiJov6MwaAgbsEALw_wcB&gclsrc=aw.ds)
    
*   📌 [5 Powerful Sales Strategies, Examples, And Best Practices](https://www.zendesk.com/blog/sales-strategy/)
    
*   📌 [8 Steps To Create Your Winning Sales Strategy, According To Industry Leaders](https://www.intercom.com/blog/sales-strategy/)
    
*   📌 [SPIN Selling: The Ultimate Guide](https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/spin-selling-the-ultimate-guide)
    
*   📌 [16 Questions for Selling in COVID-19](https://a16z.com/16-questions-for-selling-in-covid-19/)

About Terry Dtm

Terry Barridge DTM is a distinguished leader in the realm of management consulting, currently serving as the President and CEO of Marmontvale P/L. With a robust background in leadership coaching and public speaking, Terry has dedicated his career to empowering individuals and organizations to reach their full potential. Under his guidance, Marmontvale P/L has become a beacon for businesses seeking to enhance their performance, foster effective communication, and cultivate a positive public image.  
  
Terry's expertise lies in orchestrating experiential learning programs that focus on oral communication, active listening, and productive meeting facilitation. His innovative approach to crucial discussions and constructive feedback has proven instrumental in uniting teams around shared objectives, ultimately driving profitability and operational success. Notable clients such as Mitsubishi Australia, Ministry of Sound, and Zagame have benefited from his tailored coaching and professional development initiatives, which are designed to elevate both individual and organizational capabilities.  
  
As a seasoned motivational speaker and inspirational learning master, Terry excels in program development and conflict resolution, ensuring that every engagement is impactful and transformative. His commitment to servant leadership and volunteer management further underscores his belief in nurturing talent and fostering a collaborative environment. Whether through one-on-one executive speech coaching or dynamic keynote presentations, Terry Barridge DTM continues to inspire and equip leaders across various industries to navigate challenges and seize opportunities, solidifying his reputation as a trusted authority in leadership and communication.

data.markdown:
[![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/eCLhVTuf5Uw1jJziSlFwUHDd0.png)](https://www.athena.vc/)

Our Founders

Resources

[Book a call](https://calendly.com/muskan-athena/athena-founders-program-intro)

[Apply to join](https://tally.so/r/mRbWxv)

[![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/eCLhVTuf5Uw1jJziSlFwUHDd0.png)](https://www.athena.vc/)

Our Founders

Resources

[Book a call](https://calendly.com/muskan-athena/athena-founders-program-intro)

[Apply to join](https://tally.so/r/mRbWxv)

Startup Curriculum
==================

Startup Curriculum
==================

1.  Start here: [Athena’s 1 hour startup course](https://www.athena.vc/how-to-start-a-startup)
    , [Guidebook](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1UbkIClsPA-fchg3R7ypgr2Z7GedezheRqwGtq_flf1E/edit)
    , [Pick an industry](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_AsQ4WsSmL8dz9XU7WZdkqFYB_QFlIZ8jQOZ0eikLTE/edit)
    , [Study companies](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1K0VcEoufQJVuTJMsmbzw1KqvmXmKjlLLIIaWGm4ol58/edit)
    , [Find mentors](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1okfJ7tASMvTPImeMjVUMov2wu1EaawkPG1ivJ8DWAE8/edit)
    , [Talk to users](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HTiLsPnTxdDQ7oXxBmaD_zH3fV9afdK5hHbHCTQLIKc/edit)
      
      
    
2.  Learn fast: 1 book per week. Practice [speed reading](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZwEquW_Yij0)
    . Listen to audiobooks, videos at 3x speed whilst exercising. Use [listen to webpage](https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/14768725?hl=en)
    , [PDF read aloud](https://www.adobe.com/acrobat/hub/how-to-read-pdf-aloud.html)
     to continue reading when eyes are tired. [Most advice is wrong](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/-lejpyFVpR8)
    , apply everything you read with a grain of salt.
    
      
    
3.  Idea / Product: [Sam Altman's Playbook](https://playbook.samaltman.com/)
    , [Founders at Work](https://github.com/maletor/gocrosscampus/blob/master/Founders%20At%20Work%20-%20Stories%20of%20Startups%20Early%20Days%20-%20Jessica%20Livingston.pdf)
    , [Product Market Fit Series](https://review.firstround.com/series/product-market-fit)
    , [Running Lean](https://danielpandza.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/running-lean.pdf)
    , [Social Radars](https://www.thesocialradars.com/episodes)
    , [Paul Graham's Essays](http://paulgraham.com/ace.html)
    , [Startup School](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CBYhVcO4WgI&list=PL5q_lef6zVkaTY_cT1k7qFNF2TidHCe-1)
    , [YC Library](http://ycombinator.com/library/search)
    , [Steal like an Artist](https://www.google.com/search?q=steal+like+an+artist+pdf)
    . Building a 10x better product is the most important.  
      
    
4.  Learn anything with ChatGPT prompts, Sam Altman says you can learn any field in 1 year - he taught himself to start OpenAI. [_What are the biggest challenges in "industry"_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f36ae9-6860-8006-b733-ee05030aac40)
     _-_ [_Who are the main companies working on "technology"_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f36d92-de8c-8006-8a38-379aff1294ab)
     _-_ [_Design a undergraduate degree in "subject". What are online courses for these subjects. What are textbooks for these courses_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f3712f-c12c-8006-bd7b-be513620d361)
     - find on [libgen.rs](http://libgen.rs/)
     - [_What are the top scientific articles on "topic". Include the DOI_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f37434-6e70-8006-8c49-3656c4591a8e)
     _-_ Find on [sci-hub.se](http://sci-hub.se/)
    . [_Who are the main researchers in "topic"_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f38871-dee4-8006-aa50-10c08029cbbd)
     _\-_ Use [contactout.com](http://contactout.com/)
     to find their email or phone and connect.
    
      
    
5.  Learn science and deep tech that's where the biggest impact is. Elon taught himself to build cars and rockets. You can too. AI resources: [a16z AI canon](https://a16z.com/ai-canon/)
    , [Andrej Kapathy](https://karpathy.ai/zero-to-hero.html)
    , [Andrew Ng](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLoROMvodv4rMiGQp3WXShtMGgzqpfVfbU)
    . Biotech resources: [longevitycourse.org](http://longevitycourse.org/)
    , [khan academy biology](https://www.khanacademy.org/science/ap-biology)
    , [MIT biology](https://web.mit.edu/mitxbio/courses.html)
    , [Lab techniques](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLybg94GvOJ9Gn1tz2WIe-75UuZSL3wSJK)
    , [MOOC biology](https://www.brianbrookshire.com/online-biology-curriculum/)
    . Electronics: [Building a breadboard CPU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HyznrdDSSGM&list=PLowKtXNTBypGqImE405J2565dvjafglHU)
    , [Coursera: build a computer](https://coursera.org/learn/build-a-computer/)
    , [What's inside a smartphone](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL6rx9p3tbsMtRbJzFLswzvyl6OzHe32TC)
    , [Build your own iPhone](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=leFuF-zoVzA&t=4s)
     [Build your own drone](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLeuMA6tJBPKsAfRfFuGrEljpBow5hPVD4)
    , [Chip Giants Documentary](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDt0J62yU45vkJfCCLvZJQQwVjjntRhks)
    . Manufacturing: [Factory tours](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLygLgY8-7XTZnZWpJHBy6R4TNwIArW1bI)
    , [3D printing course](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDJMid0lOOYnkcFhz6rfQ6Uj8x7meNJJx)
    , [CAD machining](https://coursera.org/learn/introduction-cad-cam-practical-cnc-machining)
    . Poverty: [MIT's Poverty Action Lab](https://www.povertyactionlab.org/policy-insights)
    , [Grameen bank guidebook](https://grameenfoundation.org/documents/GrameenGuidelines.pdf)
    , Nuclear Fusion: [12 year old achieved fusion](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wh5TUlzBwLw&t=1s)
    . [Plasma Physics](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yulBSCAEyMM&list=PLogdluxJPZEqNAICx2zBrmoYNr_F_jhM3)
    . [MIT nuclear engineering](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUl4u3cNGP61FVzAxBP09w2FMQgknTOqu)
    
      
    
6.  Growth marketing: [Jared Codling's Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=anI2RlXjxJk&list=PLzRloOlG8SJ3kl7mNEFjkxQrcit46R4mz)
    , Brian Dean: [SEO](https://backlinko.com/hub/seo)
    , [Youtube](https://backlinko.com/hub/youtube)
    , [Content](https://backlinko.com/hub/content)
    , [Ahref's Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=chhuYT6jVPQ&list=PLvJ_dXFSpd2skLjxy0QRHwa9MS4xzFIIs&index=2)
     , [Shani's writing course](https://www.udemy.com/course/secret-sauce-of-great-writing/)
    , [Personal branding school](https://university.lemlist.com/masterclass?masterclass=dc6eef1b-5a12-4218-a296-518b658f40f1)
    , [Jeff's tactics](https://jgdeutsch.medium.com/marathon-of-growth-marketing-2019-the-42-must-use-growth-marketing-tactics-of-the-year-520d37c5c1dd)
    , [500 distro](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xi8UxQOuTHc&list=PLOStnEM8wBObKeWWFuh5zqac5d8XMZcfe)
    , [WMD Conference](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ehZn-Ma1Ow&list=PLOStnEM8wBOZuoKJoYSzYD7ujTzPM1jPO)
    , [Andrew Chen's blog](http://andrewchen.com/)
     and [Cold Start Problem](https://andrewchen.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/ColdStartProb_9780062969743_AS0928_cc20_Final.pdf)
    . [Marketing school podcast](https://marketingschool.io/)
    . [Sean Ellis](https://www.startup-marketing.com/)
    's [Hacking Growth](https://www.google.com/search?q=hacking+growth+sean+ellis+pdf)
     book. [Noah Kagan's](https://noahkagan.com/)
     [book](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=million+dollar+weekend+noah)
    . [Trust Me I'm Lying](https://www.google.com/search?q=trust+me+i%27m+lying+pdf)
    . [Hooked](https://www.google.com/search?q=hooked+nir+eyal+pdf)
    , [Lean Analytics](https://www.google.com/search?q=lean+analytics+alistair+croll+pdf)
    .
    
      
    
7.  Sales: [Saastr University](https://app.saastruniversity.com/all-courses)
    , [Founding Sales](https://www.foundingsales.com/table-of-contents)
    , ContactOut's [50+ real recorded sales calls](https://contactout.com/blog/sales-discovery-demo-calls/)
    ,[Predicable Revenues](https://www.google.com/search?q=predictable+revenue+aaron+ross+pdf)
    , [Impossible to Inevitable](http://libgen.is/search.php?req=from+impossible+to+inevitable)
    , [SPIN Selling](https://www.google.com/search?q=spin+selling+pdf)
    , [Challenger Sale](https://www.google.com/search?q=challenger+sale+pdf)
    , [Price Intelligently](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EcehVIB_VvWVxfEiHT7fRZcQknagqpQN/view?usp=sharing)
    , [Never Split the Difference](https://www.google.com/search?q=never+split+the+difference+pdf)
    , [Cognism's blog](https://www.cognism.com/sdr-zone)
    , [Winning by design](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2LBBr8ofb2k&list=PLyxDgAG4FWYxS_0MVP8-16DjGS49qk0kO)
    , [ContactOut's sales hub](https://contactout.com/blog/the-sales-resources-hub/)
    
      
    
8.  Productivity: [Work Ethic](https://lifeclub.org/p/work-ethic)
    , [The One Thing](https://www.google.com/search?q=the+one+thing+gary+keller+pdf)
    , [The War of Art](http://agoogle.com/search?q=the+war+of+art+pressfield+pdf)
    , [Atomic Habits](https://www.google.com/search?q=Atomic+Habits+James+Clear+pdf)
    , [4hour Work Week](https://www.google.com/search?q=4+hour+work+week+pdf)
    , [Tools of Titans](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=tools+of+titans)
    , [Mr Beast's Employee Guidebook](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1f3aEMRpMwciWSrMwHiuxiKBjHzIWBw2Y/view?usp=sharing)
    . . Health: [Outlive](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=outlive+attia)
    , [Glucose Goddess](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=Glucose+Goddess)
    
      
    
9.  Mindset: [Purpose](https://lifeclub.org/p/purpose-what-should-i-do-with-my-life)
    , [Self Compassion](https://www.google.com/search?q=self+compass+kristen+neff+pdf)
    , [Four Agreements](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=four+agreements+don+miguel)
    , [Fountainhead](https://www.google.com/search?q=The+Fountainhead+ayn+pdf)
    , [Alamanack of Naval Ravikant](https://www.google.com/search?q=Alamanack+of+Naval+Ravikant+pdf)
    , [Code of the Extraordinary Mind](https://www.google.com/search?q=the+code+of+extraordinary+mind+vishen+lakhiani+pdf)
    , [Subtle Art of Not Giving a Fuck](https://www.google.com/search?q=Subtle+Art+of+Not+Giving+a+Fuck+pdf)
    , [Radical Acceptance](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=Radical+Acceptance+tara+brach)
    , [Talent is Overrated](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=Talent+is+Overrated)
    , [The Power of Now](https://www.google.com/search?q=the+power+of+now+pdf)
    , [Happiness Trap](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=happiness+trap)
    , [Siddarth](https://www.google.com/search?q=Siddarth+herman+hesse+pdf)
    , [Man's Search for Meaning](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=mans+search+for+meaning)
    . Listen to audio books at 3x speed whilst exercising.
    
      
    
10.  Management: micromanagement is good according to: [Paul Graham](https://paulgraham.com/foundermode.html)
    , [AirBnB founder](https://pod.link/1677066062/episode/df3e0c417390af992b16a946bcb5651b)
    , [Zuckerberg](https://news.yahoo.com/tech/mark-zuckerberg-shares-one-most-122801142.html)
    , [Nvidia CEO](https://twitter.com/danhockenmaier/status/1701608618087571787)
    , [Shopify founder](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ag8UKaM988s)
    . [Crucial Conversations](https://www.google.com/search?q=crucial+conversations+kerry+pdf)
    , [Elon Musk](https://www.google.com/search?q=elon+musk+walter+isaacson+pdf)
    , [Steve Jobs](https://www.google.com/search?q=steve+jobs+isaacson+inurl%3Apdf)
     biology and management style. Duncan's [blog](https://www.cloudstreaks.com/blog)
     and [substack](https://cloudstreaks.substack.com/)
    . [1minute Manager](https://www.google.com/search?q=1minute+manager+pdf)
    , [CEO Within](https://www.google.com/search?q=ceo+within+pdf)
    , [Non-violent Communication](https://www.google.com/search?q=non-violent+communication+pdf)
    , [Dare to Lead](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=Dare+to+lead+brene)
     [Leaders Eat Last](https://www.google.com/search?q=leaders+eat+last+pdf)
    , [Principles](https://www.google.com/search?q=Principles+Ray+Dalio+pdf)
    , [Start with why](https://www.google.com/search?q=Start+with+why+pdf)
    . [High growth handbook](https://growth.eladgil.com/book/introduction/welcome-to-the-high-growth-handbook/)
    , [Empowered](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=empowered+marty)
    , [Inspired](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=inspired+marty)
    
      
    
11.  Hiring: [Athena's hiring guide](https://www.athena.vc/blog/hiring)
    . [Don't hire according to Sam Altman](https://playbook.samaltman.com/#hiring)
     keep the team small until you reach product market fit. Steve Wozniak single handled built all hardware and software for Apple I & II. Google search was made by 2 people. Contactout's [Recruitment Hub](https://contactout.com/blog/the-recruitment-mastery-hub/)
    , [Who A Method for hiring](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=who+a+method+hiring)
    
      
    
12.  Raising money: [How to get into YC](https://paulgraham.com/ace.html)
    , [Raise Millions](https://23393152.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/23393152/Book%20-%20Raise%20Millions%20-%20The%20ultimate%20guide%20to%20fundraising%20for%20first-time%20founders%20by%20Tam%20Pham%20with%20Hustle%20Fund.pdf?utm_medium=email&_hsenc=p2ANqtz--WvNpOa8LraDyUvXxVI2yzoZbNMJ-D4hrDqnSnTCUoShMOR-rlA3s9HBTwCh12Gm6tWnQlIHUqjiLQVez4s4I6MMakEA&_hsmi=290358017&utm_content=290358017&utm_source=hs_automation)
    , [Deck Doctors](https://23393152.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/23393152/Pitch%20Deck%20eBook%20-%20Deck%20Doctors%20x%20Hustle%20Fund.pdf?utm_medium=email&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-92ja17z8Efa-GEF7tPoXwXBbuI-87RDwWLpT4MZv_2arD_M2aanSAz3Elnu9ciVi-YHxId3eiZ84yvb7VpHWxggjFV-A&_hsmi=262822486&utm_content=262822486&utm_source=hs_automation)
    , [What investors look for](https://hustlefund.journey.io/p/49b297df74514be5aac58c566397bce7/full-video-60-mins-5ca3686c)
    . Investor lists: [All investors](https://www.folk.app/categories-of-famous-lists/investors)
    , [South east Asia](https://airtable.com/appRAbUwVSEOydjut/shrz5zKM9w3jM73jN/tblBTJ8plNLneZK24/viw5e96kjBPqNjIVk)
    , [VC firms](https://www.vcsheet.com/investors)
    , [Resource list](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/guillermoflor_top-10-fundraising-resources-for-startup-activity-7187865189382242304-furC)
    
      
    
13.  Doing business in Asia: [How Asia Works](https://www.google.com/search?q=how+asia+works+pdf)
    , [Asian Godfathers](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=asian+godfathers)
    , [Red Roulette](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=Red+Roulette)
    , [From Third World to First](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=From+Third+World+to+First+lee)
    , [Deng Xiaoping](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=Deng+Xiaoping+ezra)
    , [India ChatGPT books](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f39932-e93c-8006-a222-bc5065702883)
    
      
    
14.  Tax: [Nomad Capitalist](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=nomad+capitalist)
    , [Treasure Islands](https://www.google.com/search?q=treasure+islands+nicholas+pdf)
    , [Secrecy World](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=secrecy+world+jake)
    , [USA ChatGPT tax resources](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f391e1-bd90-8006-92d6-ca7e3cba96d8)
    
      
    
15.  More Resources: Blogs: [Sam Altman's blog](https://blog.samaltman.com/)
    , [a16z's blog](https://a16z.com/ai-canon/)
      [Techstar's toolkit](http://toolkit.techstars.com/)
    , [Marc's old blog](http://pmarchive.com/)
    , [startup.com playbook](http://startups.com/library/playbooks)
     and [videos](http://startups.com/library/videos)
    . Podcasts: [20VC](https://www.thetwentyminutevc.com/)
    , [My First Million](https://www.mfmpod.com/)
    , [a16z podcast](https://a16z.com/podcasts/a16z-podcast/)
    , [Marc & Ben](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-ben-marc-show/id1713388101)
    , [inDepth](https://review.firstround.com/podcast/)
    , [Sequoia podcast](https://www.sequoiacap.com/series/crucible-moments/)
    , [YC podcast](https://www.ycombinator.com/blog/tag/podcast)
    , [the social radars](https://www.thesocialradars.com/)
    , [Lenny's podcast](https://www.lennyspodcast.com/)
    , [Marketing school](https://marketingschool.io/)
    , [Bill Gates podcast](https://www.gatesnotes.com/Podcast)
    . Videos: [How to build the future](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TYt5yuiGk9E&list=PLQ-uHSnFig5MoTTcgd8EzenEADqGTQPpW)
    , [the old startup school lectures](https://www.youtube.com/@ycombinator/search?query=startup%20school)
    , [ASUGSV](https://www.youtube.com/c/GlobalSiliconValley)
    , [Bill Gates](https://www.youtube.com/@billgates)
    , [Sequoia AI Ascent](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOhHNjZItNnOoPxOF3dmq30UxYqFuxXKn)
    , [LongevityCourse.org](http://longevitycourse.org/)
     Books: [Lean Startup](https://www.google.com/search?q=lean+startup+pdf)
    , [Zero To One](https://www.google.com/search?q=zero+to+one+peter+thiel+pdf)
    , [Setting The Table](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=setting+the+table+danny+meyer)
    , [Blitzscaling](https://libgen.rs/search.php?req=blitzscaling+reid+hoffman)

1.  Start here: [Athena’s 1 hour startup course](https://www.athena.vc/how-to-start-a-startup)
    , [Guidebook](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1UbkIClsPA-fchg3R7ypgr2Z7GedezheRqwGtq_flf1E/edit)
    , [Pick an industry](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_AsQ4WsSmL8dz9XU7WZdkqFYB_QFlIZ8jQOZ0eikLTE/edit)
    , [Study companies](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1K0VcEoufQJVuTJMsmbzw1KqvmXmKjlLLIIaWGm4ol58/edit)
    , [Find mentors](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1okfJ7tASMvTPImeMjVUMov2wu1EaawkPG1ivJ8DWAE8/edit)
    , [Talk to users](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HTiLsPnTxdDQ7oXxBmaD_zH3fV9afdK5hHbHCTQLIKc/edit)
      
      
    
2.  Learn fast: 1 book per week. Practice [speed reading](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZwEquW_Yij0)
    . Listen to audiobooks, videos at 3x speed whilst exercising. Use [listen to webpage](https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/14768725?hl=en)
    , [PDF read aloud](https://www.adobe.com/acrobat/hub/how-to-read-pdf-aloud.html)
     to continue reading when eyes are tired. [Most advice is wrong](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/-lejpyFVpR8)
    , apply everything you read with a grain of salt.
    
      
    
3.  Idea / Product: [Sam Altman's Playbook](https://playbook.samaltman.com/)
    , [Founders at Work](https://github.com/maletor/gocrosscampus/blob/master/Founders%20At%20Work%20-%20Stories%20of%20Startups%20Early%20Days%20-%20Jessica%20Livingston.pdf)
    , [Product Market Fit Series](https://review.firstround.com/series/product-market-fit)
    , [Running Lean](https://danielpandza.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/running-lean.pdf)
    , [Social Radars](https://www.thesocialradars.com/episodes)
    , [Paul Graham's Essays](http://paulgraham.com/ace.html)
    , [Startup School](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CBYhVcO4WgI&list=PL5q_lef6zVkaTY_cT1k7qFNF2TidHCe-1)
    , [YC Library](http://ycombinator.com/library/search)
    , [Steal like an Artist](https://www.google.com/search?q=steal+like+an+artist+pdf)
    . Building a 10x better product is the most important.  
      
    
4.  Learn anything with ChatGPT prompts, Sam Altman says you can learn any field in 1 year - he taught himself to start OpenAI. [_What are the biggest challenges in "industry"_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f36ae9-6860-8006-b733-ee05030aac40)
     _-_ [_Who are the main companies working on "technology"_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f36d92-de8c-8006-8a38-379aff1294ab)
     _-_ [_Design a undergraduate degree in "subject". What are online courses for these subjects. What are textbooks for these courses_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f3712f-c12c-8006-bd7b-be513620d361)
     - find on [libgen.rs](http://libgen.rs/)
     - [_What are the top scientific articles on "topic". Include the DOI_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f37434-6e70-8006-8c49-3656c4591a8e)
     _-_ Find on [sci-hub.se](http://sci-hub.se/)
    . [_Who are the main researchers in "topic"_](https://chatgpt.com/share/66f38871-dee4-8006-aa50-10c08029cbbd)
     _\-_ Use [contactout.com](http://contactout.com/)
     to find their email or phone and connect.

![Globus family of brands logo](https://images.contactout.com/companies/39840c1951bab7ad09c372aea48a9dd3) Globus family of brands ======================= [](https://www.linkedin.com/company/globus-family-of-brands) [Get verified emails for Globus family of brands employees\ ---------------------------------------------------------\ \ ![arrow](https://contactout.com/images/ico-arrow-narrow-right.svg)](javascript:;) * [Profile](https://contactout.com/company/Globus-family-of-brands-44042) * [Email Format](https://contactout.com/company/Globus-family-of-brands-email-format-44042) About Globus family of brands ----------------------------- For nearly a century, Globus family of brands has been providing a variety of vacations, escorted tours, and river cruises applauded by a diverse range of travel lovers. With hundreds of unique itineraries designed and operated with unmatched expertise, Globus, Cosmos, and Avalon Waterways share the world’s most iconic destinations and lesser-known treasures found just off the beaten path. From Europe to North and South America—from Asia to Australia—Globus family of brands sets the gold standard for the art of travel planning to go beyond the guidebooks with unmatched value, insider knowledge, and world-class customer service with every journey. The Globus family of brands is hiring engaging and service oriented associates. We have a proven culture that promotes success and upward mobility. We have built a strong reputation with our tremendous products as well as our unmatched commitment to a fantastic guest experience. If you want to come to work and connect with guests about something fun and fulfilling their travel dreams, apply today! · Ongoing product and destination training · Opportunities to grow within team, department and company · Fun and casual work environment OR work virtually · 16 days Paid Time Off a year, plus paid holidays, plus floating holidays · Health, vision, dental insurance · Company paid life insurance, Short Term Disability, Long Term Disability & AD&D · 401(k) with a generous company match AND a pension/profit sharing plan · Travel discounts & incentives · Tuition Reimbursement For more information on the company, please visit our Website www.globusfamily.com see more | | | | --- | --- | | ![website icon](https://contactout.com/images/ico-link-01.svg)
